mapper.select:
SELECT m.meterid as meterId,r.ccustno as userNo,r.cname as userName,a.name || '-' || b.name || '-' || r.name AS addr, m.meterNumber ::VARCHAR(16) as meterNumber, m.state as state, th_number as thNumber, m.th_r_time AS thRTime FROM ha_meter m, ha_area a, ha_building b, ha_pricestandard p, (SELECT r.*,c.custno AS ccustno, c.name AS cname FROM ha_room r LEFT OUTER JOIN ha_custom c ON(r.custid=c.custid)) r WHERE m.meterNumber>0 AND b.areaid=a.areaid AND m.pricestand_id=p.pricestand_id AND m.roomid=r.roomid AND r.buildingid=b.buildingid
AND (position('正常' in m.state)>0 OR position('正确' in m.state)>0 OR position( '光通道干扰' in m.state)>0 OR position('强光干扰' in m.state)>0 OR position('气泡干扰' in m.state)>0 OR position('表具故障' in m.state)>0)
AND (Left(m.state, 2) != '重号' AND m.state LIKE '%${HaMeter.state}%')
ORDER BY a.areaid,p.name,b.name,r.name,m.meterNumber limit #{page} OFFSET #{rowNum}

SELECT count(1) FROM ha_meter m, ha_area a, ha_building b, ha_pricestandard p, (SELECT r.*,c.custno AS ccustno, c.name AS cname FROM ha_room r LEFT OUTER JOIN ha_custom c ON(r.custid=c.custid)) r WHERE m.meterNumber>0 AND b.areaid=a.areaid AND m.pricestand_id=p.pricestand_id AND m.roomid=r.roomid AND r.buildingid=b.buildingid
AND (position('正常' in m.state)>0 OR position('正确' in m.state)>0 OR position( '光通道干扰' in m.state)>0 OR position('强光干扰' in m.state)>0 OR position('气泡干扰' in m.state)>0 OR position('表具故障' in m.state)>0)
AND (Left(m.state, 2) != '重号' AND m.state LIKE '%${HaMeter.state}%')
SELECT th_number AS thNumber , th_r_time AS thRTime , state AS state , s_number AS sNumber FROM ha_meter WHERE meterid=#{meterid}

SELECT CASE WHEN cu.custno is null THEN '*' ELSE cu.custno End AS userNo , CASE WHEN cu.name is null THEN '*' ELSE cu.name END AS userName , a.name||'-'||b.name||'-'||r.name AS userDs ,m.meterNumber AS meterNumber FROM ha_meter m LEFT JOIN ha_room r ON m.roomid=r.roomid LEFT JOIN ha_building b ON r.buildingid=b.buildingid LEFT JOIN ha_area a ON m.areaid=a.areaid LEFT JOIN ha_custom cu ON r.custid=cu.custid WHERE m.meterid =#{meterId}

SELECT CASE WHEN cu.custno is null THEN '*' ELSE cu.custno End AS userNo , CASE WHEN cu.name is null THEN '*' ELSE cu.name END AS userName , a.name||'-'||b.name||'-'||r.name AS userDs ,m.meterNumber AS meterNumber ,m.meterid AS meterId FROM ha_meter m LEFT JOIN ha_room r ON m.roomid=r.roomid LEFT JOIN ha_building b ON r.buildingid=b.buildingid LEFT JOIN ha_area a ON m.areaid=a.areaid LEFT JOIN ha_custom cu ON r.custid=cu.custid WHERE (cu.custno = #{ketWordTwo} or to_char(m.meterNumber,'fm9999999999999') = #{ketWordTwo})

SELECT m.meterid AS meterId , mi.用户号 AS userNo , mi.用户名 AS userName , mi.用户地址 AS userDs ,m.meterNumber AS meterNumber , m.th_number AS thNumber ,m.lf_number AS lfNumber ,m.s_number AS sNumber , m.state AS state ,m.th_r_time AS thRTime ,m.lf_time AS lfTime FROM ha_meter m inner join hav_meterinfo mi on mi.meterid = m.meterid where 1=1 and (LEFT(mi.areaNo,1) = #{rgnAndAreaId} or mi.areaNo = #{rgnAndAreaId} or #{rgnAndAreaId} = '')
AND mi.areaid IN (cast(#{params.nodeIds} as INTEGER))
AND position(Left(mi.areaNo, 1) IN #{params.nodeIds})>0
AND mi.DS=#{params.monthType}
and (mi.用户号 like '%${params.keyWord}%' or mi.用户名 like '%${params.keyWord}%' or mi.用户地址 like '%${params.keyWord}%' or m.state = #{params.keyWord} or to_char(mi.表号,'fm999999999999999') like '%${params.keyWord}%' or to_char(m.th_number, 'fm99999999999999') like '%${params.keyWord}%' or to_char(m.lf_number, 'fm99999999999999') like '%${params.keyWord}%' or to_char(m.s_number, 'fm99999999999999') like '%${params.keyWord}%' or to_char(m.th_r_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') like '%${params.keyWord}%' or to_char(m.lf_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') like '%${params.keyWord}%')
ORDER BY mi.用户地址

SELECT mi.meterid AS meterId ,mi.用户号 AS userNo ,mi.用户名 AS userName ,mi.用户地址 AS userDs ,mi.表号 AS meterNumber ,t.th_number AS thNumber ,t.lf_number AS lfNumber ,t.s_number AS sNumber ,mi.状态 AS state ,mi.抄表时间 AS thRTime , t.centorNo AS centorNo , to_hex(t.nconf) AS nconf FROM hav_meterinfo mi left join ( SELECT * FROM ha_meter m LEFT JOIN ha_centor ce ON m.centorid=ce.id LEFT JOIN ha_collector co ON m.collectorid=co.collectorid ) t on t.meterId=mi.meterId WHERE is_meter_err_state(mi.状态) AND mi.表号 >0
AND mi.areaid IN (cast(#{params.nodeIds} as INTEGER))
AND position(Left(mi.areaNo, 1) IN #{params.nodeIds})>0
AND mi.状态 IN #{zt}
and (mi.用户号 like '%${params.keyWord}%' or mi.用户名 like '%${params.keyWord}%' or mi.用户地址 like '%${params.keyWord}%' or to_char(mi.表号, 'fm9999999999999999') like '%${params.keyWord}%' or to_char(t.lf_number, 'fm9999999999999999') like '%${params.keyWord}%' or to_char(t.s_number, 'fm9999999999999999') like '%${params.keyWord}%' or mi.状态 =#{params.keyWord} or t.centorNo like '%${params.keyWord}%' or to_hex(t.nconf) like '%${params.keyWord}%' )
ORDER BY mi.用户地址, mi.状态, mi.用户号

SELECT m.meterid AS meterId , mi.用户号 AS userNo , mi.用户名 AS userName , mi.用户地址 AS userDs ,m.meterNumber AS meterNumber ,m.th_number AS thNumber ,m.lf_number AS lfNumber ,m.s_number AS sNumber , m.state AS state ,m.th_r_time AS thRTime ,m.lf_time AS lfTime ,m.th_number AS recentRead , m.state AS recentreadstate , m.th_r_time AS recentreadtime FROM ha_meter m, hav_meterinfo mi, ha_area a WHERE m.meterid=mi.meterid AND a.areaid=mi.areaid and (LEFT(mi.areaNo,1) = #{rgnAndAreaId} or mi.areaNo = #{rgnAndAreaId} or #{rgnAndAreaId} = '')
and ( mi.用户号 like '%${params.keyWord}%' or mi.用户名 like '%${params.keyWord}%' or mi.用户地址 like '%${params.keyWord}%' or to_char(m.meterNumber,'fm99999999999999') like '%${params.keyWord}%' or to_char(mi.最近度数, 'fm9999999999999999') like '%${params.keyWord}%' or to_char(m.lf_number, '99999999999999') like '%${params.keyWord}%' or to_char(m.s_number, '99999999999999') like '%${params.keyWord}%' or m.state = #{params.keyWord} or to_char(m.th_r_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') like '%${params.keyWord}%')
ORDER BY mi.用户地址

SELECT m.meterId AS meterId , cu.custno AS userNo , a.name||'-'||b.name||'-'||r.name AS userDs , cu.name AS userName , m.meterNumber AS meterNumber , m.state AS state , to_hex(co.nconf) AS nconf FROM ha_meter m LEFT JOIN ha_room r ON m.roomid=r.roomid LEFT JOIN ha_building b ON r.buildingid=b.buildingid LEFT JOIN ha_area a ON m.areaid=a.areaid LEFT JOIN ha_custom cu ON r.custid=cu.custid LEFT JOIN ha_collector co ON m.collectorid=co.collectorid WHERE m.centorid=#{centorId} ORDER BY cu.custno,b.name||'-'||r.name,to_hex(co.nconf)

SELECT m.meterid AS meterId , cu.custno AS userNo , r.name AS rname , cu.name AS userName , m.meterNumber AS meterNumber , to_hex(co.nconf) AS nconf FROM ha_meter m LEFT JOIN ha_room r ON m.roomid=r.roomid LEFT JOIN ha_custom cu ON r.custid=cu.custid LEFT JOIN ha_collector co ON m.collectorid=co.collectorid WHERE m.collectorId=#{collectorId}

SELECT meterid as meterId, cu.custno AS custNo, b.name AS bname, r.name AS rname, Left(cu.name,16) AS cname, m.meterNumber ::VARCHAR(16) AS meterNumber, ce.addr AS centoraddr, co.addr AS collectoraddr FROM ((((ha_meter m LEFT JOIN ha_room r ON m.roomid=r.roomid) LEFT JOIN ha_building b ON r.buildingid=b.buildingid) LEFT JOIN ha_custom cu ON r.custid=cu.custid) LEFT JOIN ha_centor ce ON m.centorid=ce.id) LEFT JOIN ha_collector co ON m.collectorid=co.collectorid WHERE m.areaid=#{haMeter.areaId} ORDER BY cu.custno,b.name||'-'||r.name
select count(1) from ha_meter
mapper.insert: insert into ha_meter (meterid, roomid, pricestand_id, rate, isbranch, starttime,centorid, meternumber, collectorid,p_number,offset_n) values (default ,#{roomId},#{pricestandId},#{rate},#{isBranch},#{startTime},#{centorId},#{meterNumber},#{collectorId},#{pnumber},#{offsetN})
mapper.update:
update ha_meter m
centorid = #{haMeter.centorId}, collectorid = #{haMeter.collectorId}, addr=ce.centorid::varchar(10)||','||to_hex(co.nconf)||','||(CASE WHEN m.meterNumber!=0 THEN m.meterNumber::varchar(16) ELSE 'x' END) FROM ha_centor ce,ha_collector co
mapper.select: SELECT Count(m.meterId) FROM ha_meter m WHERE m.centorid=#{centorId} AND m.collectorid=#{collectorId} AND m.meterid IN (#{meterIds})
mapper.update:
update ha_meter m
centorid = #{readLineId}, collectorid=NULL, addr=ce.centorid::varchar(10)||',x,'||(CASE WHEN m.meterNumber!=0 THEN m.meterNumber::varchar(16) ELSE 'x' END) FROM ha_centor ce
mapper.select: SELECT Count(m.meterId) FROM ha_meter m WHERE m.centorid=#{readLineId} AND m.meterid IN (#{meterIds})
mapper.update:
update ha_meter m
centorid=NULL, collectorid=NULL, addr='x,x,'||(CASE WHEN m.meterNumber!=0 THEN m.meterNumber::varchar(16) ELSE 'x' END)
mapper.select: SELECT Count(m.meterId) FROM ha_meter m WHERE m.meterid IN (#{meterIds})
SELECT COUNT(meterid) FROM ha_meter WHERE pricestand_id IN (#{id})
SELECT addr,rate,starttime,isbranch,roomid,pricestand_id as pricestandId, g_number,lf_number,th_number,state,centorid,meterNumber,collectorid,offset_n FROM ha_meter WHERE meterid=#{haMeter.meterId}
SELECT COUNT(meterid) FROM ha_meter WHERE roomid=#{roomId}
SELECT g_number FROM ha_meter WHERE meterid=#{meterId}
SELECT meterNumber FROM ha_meter WHERE meterid=#{meterId}
SELECT meter_sequence FROM ha_meter WHERE meterid=#{meterId}

SELECT MIN(meter_sequence)+1 FROM (SELECT meter_sequence FROM ha_meter WHERE centorid=#{centorId} AND meter_sequence+1 NOT IN (SELECT meter_sequence FROM ha_meter WHERE centorid=#{centorId2} AND isNull(meter_sequence)=false))
